about_the_game:
PowerDirector 2025 Ultra

Elevate your vision with high quality video editing software featuring an intuitive interface and advanced AI-powered tools.

AI Background Remover

Flawlessly remove backgrounds from your footage or automatically cut out subjects from videos or images to add to other creations — no green screen needed!

AI Auto Face Blur

Auto detect, selectively apply, and modify Mosaic and Gaussian blur effects to multiple faces in your video frames.

AI Motion Tracking

Add text, graphics, and effects that follow objects with near perfect accuracy in your clips with frame-by-frame motion tracking.

AI Body Effects

Instantly apply striking visual effects to moving people or objects.

Video & Title Masks

Create custom masks with an intuitive designer to composite and design unique titles, images, graphics, or videos.

Keyframe Controls

Take total control of your projects and fine-tune effects, animations, and masks with enhanced keyframing.

Blending Modes

Choose from 9 modes to layer and blend videos and images to create surreal and impactful imagery

Thousands of Intro Templates

Save time with thousands of customizable video intros and an intuitive template designer.

Customizable Animated Titles

Add titles with unique animated templates that include motion graphics and sound effects.

Video Stabilizer

Fix unwanted camera shake with a state-of-the-art video stabilizer.
detailed_description:
PowerDirector 2025 Ultra

Elevate your vision with high quality video editing software featuring an intuitive interface and advanced AI-powered tools.

AI Background Remover

Flawlessly remove backgrounds from your footage or automatically cut out subjects from videos or images to add to other creations — no green screen needed!

AI Auto Face Blur

Auto detect, selectively apply, and modify Mosaic and Gaussian blur effects to multiple faces in your video frames.

AI Motion Tracking

Add text, graphics, and effects that follow objects with near perfect accuracy in your clips with frame-by-frame motion tracking.

AI Body Effects

Instantly apply striking visual effects to moving people or objects.

Video & Title Masks

Create custom masks with an intuitive designer to composite and design unique titles, images, graphics, or videos.

Keyframe Controls

Take total control of your projects and fine-tune effects, animations, and masks with enhanced keyframing.

Blending Modes

Choose from 9 modes to layer and blend videos and images to create surreal and impactful imagery

Thousands of Intro Templates

Save time with thousands of customizable video intros and an intuitive template designer.

Customizable Animated Titles

Add titles with unique animated templates that include motion graphics and sound effects.

Video Stabilizer

Fix unwanted camera shake with a state-of-the-art video stabilizer.

name: CyberLink PowerDirector 2025 Ultra

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 11, 10 (64 bit OS only, Windows 11 Arm64 is supported) *Microsoft Windows 11 or 10 required for AI features and NVIDIA Audio/Video Denoise and Room Echo Removal.
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i-series (6th generation) or AMD Ryzen-series and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Standard Video: 128 MB VGA VRAM or higher. 360-video: DirectX 11 compatible. AI Plugin: 2 GB VGA VRAM or higher. NVIDIA Audio/Video Denoise and Room Echo Removal: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060, NVIDIA Quadro RTX 3000, NVIDIA TITAN RTX, or higher.
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card is required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Elevate your vision with high quality video editing software featuring an intuitive interface and advanced AI-powered tools.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
